revised_title: Bi-harmonic Analysis in a Perforated Strip
tldr: This article presents a method for solving the bi-harmonic equation in a region bounded by two parallel straight lines and a circle. The analysis is generalized to include unsymmetrical solutions and provides formulae to solve any problem of stress within the specified boundaries. Two important special cases, corresponding to pure bending-moment and bending-moment with shear, are worked out in detail. The results can also be applied to the slow motion of a viscous fluid.
